content.prompt: Which of the following is the main claim that the author makes in the first paragraph?

choices.label: Europeans should learn from the knowledge and wisdom of classical Greece and Rome.
Philosophy and science are fundamentally incompatible.
Ethics and morality are subjective and culture-specific.
People have natural rights that can be established through rational inquiry.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
